mean_cn: adj. 环境的，周围的；  n. 环境论
mean_en: concerned with the protection of the natural world of land, sea, air, plants, and animals.
word_etyma: environment环境 + al形容词后缀 → environmental 环境的
sentence: Air pollution from factories has caused many bad environmental problems.
sentence_trans: 工厂带来的空气污染造成了很多严重的环境问题。
